en.title: Application submitted
en.emailSentConfirmation: You have been sent a confirmation by email.
en.line1: An email has been sent to the applicant, that explains what happens next.
en.line2: Please contact online_application@justice.gov.uk if you do not receive the email.
en.line3: What did you think of this service?

cy.title: Cais wedi'i gyflwyno
cy.emailSentConfirmation: Mae cadarnhad wedi’i anfon atoch drwy e-bost.
cy.line1: Mae neges e-bost wedi’i hanfon at y ceisydd, i esbonio beth fydd yn digwydd nesaf.
cy.line2: Cysylltwch â online_application@justice.gov.uk os nad ydych yn cael y neges e-bost.
cy.line3: Beth oedd eich barn am y gwasanaeth hwn?
